alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 11:09AM MDT until May 06 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Garfield, Piute, Iron, Kane and Sevier Counties. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet (1046 cfs), minor flooding will affect fields near and downstream of the river gage. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Friday the stage was 4.0 feet (1105 cfs) and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM MDT Friday was 4.3 feet (1353 cfs). - Forecast...The river will oscillate around or just below flood stage through Monday, before rising back above flood stage late Tuesday morning, per the latest forecast. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet (1046 cfs). - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.0 feet on 05/17/1993. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 500 AM MDT.
